pages.title: Getting Started
pages.description: Learn how to get started with Rivet Actors
pages.markdown:
# Getting Started

Learn how to get started with Rivet.

## Installation

Install Rivet using npm:

```bash
npm install rivetkit
```

## Your First Actor

Create your first Rivet Actor by defining a class that extends Actor.
pages.plaintext: Getting Started Learn how to get started with Rivet. Installation Install Rivet using npm. Your First Actor Create your first Rivet Actor by defining a class that extends Actor.

pages.title: Rivet Actors
pages.description: Learn about Rivet Actors and their lifecycle
pages.markdown:
# Rivet Actors

## Overview

Actors are the core building block of Rivet applications. They provide stateful, long-running processes.

## Actor Lifecycle

Actors go through distinct lifecycle phases: onCreate, onStart, and onDestroy.
pages.plaintext: Rivet Actors Overview Actors are the core building block of Rivet applications. Actor Lifecycle Actors go through distinct lifecycle phases.

Install Rivet using npm:

```bash
npm install rivetkit
```
